DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore effect strength & conditioning ( S & C ) program risk factor injury ( Y-balance Functional Movement Screen score ) , well parent report injury occurrence 12-16 year old male female athlete . Forty girls 40 boy age 12-16 recruit ; half participate supervise S & C sessions 2-3x/week half continue regular sport activity . Risk factor injury performance index ( 20 sprint multiple jump test ) assess 4 month study . Injury occurrence record via bi-weekly phone call parent athlete .
DOC.criteria: Athletes 12 16 year age , actively participate organize sport Any condition injury place athlete risk test training
